Articles.Content:
Forget about that old and busted Ferd F-teenthousand to transport all of your kethane, haul it like a man in the Kerbalbilt 379. This thing has 22 wheels, all wheel drive all the time and it doesn't roll over most of the time. This truck is even bendable in the middle, can uncouple and recouple from the trailer, and do a drift at 25mps. I built this truck so I could have some kethane plants in the middle of nowhere, I fly this bad boy into range in two parts, the truck, then the trailer hook them together and go. Be it a goat path, scary holler, or even a mild crater this thing can get to it in atmo, attach the KAS and transfer some fuel into it then head back with 28000 units of kethane to get hauled away. Heck it even goes fast, a whopping topspeed of 26mps on flat ground.

Really though I just like this truck, I haven't hard any type of problems out of it and it holds up great to mild jumps and I really have never come close to rolling it. It fits in the back of my MK4 plane, uses the KAS to "dock" its self to the plane and gets delivered to wherever on kerbin that I need it, so I thought I would share.

Mods needed are

B9 Areospace

K.A.S.

Kethane mod

Majic Smoke Industries 0.7

TT ModularWheels

https://www.dropbox.com/s/a1fx4w2983464cp/Kerbalbilt%20379.craft

Edited August 24, 2013 by fcdrifter13
Drop Box not working for some reason
